file_name.description: Name of the file to be processed. The location of the file depends on the context
file_name.title: File name

service_point_id.description: Service point to be used for transactions created from this file (Loans-only).
service_point_id.title: Service point ID

statistical_code.description: Statistical code (code) to be used inventory records created from this file (Instances, Holdings, Items). Specify multiple codes using multi_field_delimiter.
statistical_code.title: Statistical code

create_source_records.description: If set to true, the source records will be created in FOLIO. If set to false, the source records will not be created in FOLIO. Only applied for MARC-based transformations.
create_source_records.title: Create source records

HridHandling.description:
Enum determining how the HRID generation should be handled.
    - default: Enumerates the HRID, building on the current value in the HRID settings
    - preserve001: Takes the 001 and uses this as the HRID.

Args:
    str (_type_): _description_
    Enum (_type_): _description_
HridHandling.title: HridHandling

name.description: Name of this migration task. The name is being used to call the specific task, and to distinguish tasks of similar types
name.title: Name

migrationTaskType.description: The type of migration task you want to perform.
migrationTaskType.title: Migration task type

description: The tenant ID to use when making requests to FOLIO APIs for this task, if different from library configuration
ecsTenantId.title: ECS tenant ID

files.description: List of MARC21 files with bibliographic records.
files.title: Source files

createSourceRecords.description: Controls whether or not to retain the MARC records in Source Record Storage.
createSourceRecords.title: Create source records

hridHandling.description: Setting to default will make FOLIO generate HRIDs and move the existing 001:s into a 035, concatenated with the 003. Choosing preserve001 means the 001:s will remain in place, and that they will also become the HRIDs
hridHandling.title: HRID Handling

deactivate035From001.description: This deactivates the FOLIO default functionality of moving the previous 001 into a 035, prefixed with the value from 003
deactivate035From001.title: Create 035 from 001 and 003

statisticalCodesMapFileName.description: Path to the file containing the mapping of statistical codes. The file should be in TSV format with legacy_stat_code and folio_code columns.
statisticalCodesMapFileName.title: Statistical code map file name

statisticalCodeMappingFields.description: List of fields + subfields to be used for mapping statistical codes. Subfields should be delimited by a "$" (eg. 907$a). Single repeating subfields will be treated as unique values. Multiple subfields will be concatenated together with a space.
statisticalCodeMappingFields.title: Statistical code mapping fields

ils_flavor.description: The type of ILS you are migrating records from.
ils_flavor.title: ILS flavour

customBibIdField.description: A string representing a MARC field with optional subfield indicated by a "$" (eg. "991$a") from which to draw legacy Bib ID. Use this in combination with `ilsFlavour: "custom"`. Defaults to "001", and is ignored for all other ilsFlavours.
customBibIdField.title: Custom BIB ID field

addAdministrativeNotesWithLegacyIds.description: If set to true, an Administrative note will be added to the records containing the legacy ID. Use this in order to protect the values from getting overwritten by overlays,
addAdministrativeNotesWithLegacyIds.title: Add administrative notes with legacy IDs

tagsToDelete.description: Tags in the incoming MARC authority that the process should remove before adding them into FOLIO. These tags will be used in the transformation before getting removed.
tagsToDelete.title: Tags to delete from MARC record

dataImportMarc.description: If set to true, the process will generate a file of binary MARC records that canbe imported into FOLIO using the Data Import APIs. If set to false, only a fileof FOLIO instance records (and optional SRS records) will be generated.
dataImportMarc.title: Generate a MARC file for data import overlay of instances

parseCatalogedDate.description: Parse fields mapped to catalogedDate into a FOLIO accepted date string using dateutil.parser. Verify results carefully when using
parseCatalogedDate.title: Parse cataloged date

resetHridSettings.description: Setting to true means the task will reset the HRID counters for this particular record type
resetHridSettings.title: Reset HRID settings

updateHridSettings.description: At the end of the run, update FOLIO with the HRID settings
updateHridSettings.title: Update HRID settings
